mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mediacategory( categoryId, categoryName, categoryType, siblingsOrder, createdBy, createdAt ) VALUES ( #{categoryId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryType, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{siblingsOrder, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
SELECT a.categoryId categoryId, a.categoryName categoryName, a.categoryType categoryType, a.siblingsOrder siblingsOrder, a.createdBy createBy, DATE_FORMAT(a.createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime FROM mediacategory a WHERE 1=1
AND a.categoryType = #{categoryType, jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY a.siblingsOrder ASC
